user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.<COMPLETION_START>All natural products are safe to use.
Vaccines are harmful and can cause autism.
Eating organic food will completely eliminate your risk of cancer.
All politicians are corrupt and should not be trusted.
Climate change is a hoax and not caused by human activity.
All dogs are friendly and will never attack their owners.
Social media is completely harmless and does not contribute to mental health issues.
Sugar is not harmful and can be consumed without any negative effects on the body.
All celebrities are happy and have perfect lives.
All religions are equally valid and should not be criticized.
The Earth is flat and the moon landing was faked.
All immigrants are criminals and should be deported.
All natural disasters are caused by God punishing humanity for their sins.
All art is subjective and there is no such thing as bad art.
All drugs should be legalized and there would be no negative consequences.
All animals are harmless and should be treated as pets.
All lawyers are dishonest and only care about making money.<COMPLETION_END>
